00026 POSTable::POSTable()
00027     : strTableVec_(POS_FORMAT_NUM), tableSize_(0), ruleRoot_(0)

00031 POSTable::~POSTable()

00036 bool POSTable::loadConfig(const char* fileName, MeCab::Iconv& iconv)
00037 {
00038     assert(fileName);
00039 
00040     // remove the previous table if exists
00041     tableSize_ = 0;
00042     for(unsigned int i=0; i<strTableVec_.size(); ++i)
00043         strTableVec_[i].clear();
00044 
00045     // open file
00046     const DictUnit* dict = JMA_Dictionary::instance()->getDict(fileName);
00047     if(! dict)
00048     {
00049         cerr << "cannot find configuration file: " << fileName << endl;
00050         return false;
00051     }
00052 
00053     istrstream from(dict->text_, dict->length_);
00054     if(! from)
00055     {
00056         cerr << "cannot read configuration file: " << fileName << endl;
00057         return false;
00058     }
00059 
00060     // read file
00061     string line, fullPOS, partPOS, alphabetPOS;
00062     string::size_type i, j, k;
00063     const char* whitespaces = " \t";
00064 
00065     // to convert from index string to int value
00066     istringstream iss;
00067     int indexValue;
00068 
00069 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00070     cout << "load POS table: " << fileName << endl;
00071     cout << "src charset: " << src << endl;
00072     cout << "dest charset: " << dest << endl;
00073     cout << "fullPOS\t\tindex\tAlphabet partPOS" << endl;
00074 #endif
00075 
00076     // each line is assumed in the format "fullPOS index AlphabetPOS",
00077     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00078     while(getline(from, line))
00079     {
00080         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00081         if(line.empty())
00082             continue;
00083 
00084         // set fullPOS
00085         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces);
00086         if(j == string::npos)
00087             continue;
00088         fullPOS = line.substr(0, j);
00089 
00090         // convert encoding
00091         if(! iconv.convert(&fullPOS))
00092         {
00093             cerr << "error to convert encoding for POS string " << fullPOS << endl;
00094             return false;
00095         }
00096         k = fullPOS.find('*');
00097         if(k == string::npos)
00098             partPOS = fullPOS;
00099         else if(k == 0)
00100             partPOS = "";
00101         else
00102             partPOS = fullPOS.substr(0, k-1); // get "AAA" from "AAA,*"
00103 
00104         // set index
00105         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00106         if(i == string::npos)
00107             continue;
00108         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00109         if(j == string::npos)
00110             continue;
00111         iss.clear();
00112         iss.str(line.substr(i, j-i));
00113         iss >> indexValue;
00114 
00115         // set alphabetPOS
00116         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00117         if(i == string::npos)
00118             continue;
00119         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00120         if(j == string::npos)
00121             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i);
00122         else
00123             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i, j-i);
00124 
00125 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00126         cout << fullPOS << "\t" << indexValue << "\t" << alphabetPOS << "\t" << partPOS << endl;
00127 #endif
00128 
00129         if(indexValue < 0)
00130         {
00131             cerr << "the index code of POS (" << fullPOS << ", " << alphabetPOS << ") should not be a negative value: " << indexValue << endl;
00132             continue;
00133         }
00134 
00135         if(indexValue >= tableSize_)
00136         {
00137             tableSize_ = indexValue + 1;
00138             for(unsigned int i=0; i<strTableVec_.size(); ++i)
00139                 strTableVec_[i].resize(tableSize_);
00140         }
00141 
00142         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_DEFAULT][indexValue] = partPOS;
00143         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][indexValue] = alphabetPOS;
00144         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY][indexValue] = fullPOS;
00145 
00146         alphaPOSMap_[alphabetPOS] = indexValue;
00147     }
00148 
00149 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00150     cout << "total " << tableSize_ << " POS loaded" << endl << endl;
00151 #endif
00152 
00153     return true;
00154 }
00155 
00156 const char* POSTable::getPOS(int index, POSFormat format) const
00157 {
00158     if(index < 0 || index >= tableSize_)
00159         return "";
00160 
00161     return strTableVec_[format][index].c_str();
00162 }

00164 bool POSTable::loadCombineRule(const char* fileName)
00165 {
00166     assert(fileName);
00167 
00168     // remove the previous rule Trie if exists
00169     delete ruleRoot_;
00170     ruleRoot_ = new RuleNode(0, tableSize_);
00171 
00172     // open file
00173     ifstream from(fileName);
00174     if(! from)
00175     {
00176         return false;
00177     }
00178 
00179     // read file
00180     string line, pos;
00181     vector<string> posVec;
00182     vector<string>::const_iterator it;
00183     istringstream iss;
00184 
00185 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00186     cout << "load POS rule: " << fileName << endl;
00187     cout << "source1 source2 ... target" << endl;
00188 #endif
00189 
00190     // each line is assumed in the format "source1 source2 ... target",
00191     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00192     while(getline(from, line))
00193     {
00194         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00195         if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
00196             continue;
00197 
00198         iss.clear();
00199         posVec.clear();
00200         iss.str(line);
00201         while(iss >> pos)
00202         {
00203             posVec.push_back(pos);
00204         }
00205 
00206         if(posVec.size() < 2)
00207         {
00208             cerr << "ignore invalid rule: " << line << endl;
00209             cerr << "it should be \"source1 source2 ... target\"." << endl;
00210             continue;
00211         }
00212 
00213 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00214         for(it=posVec.begin(); it!=posVec.end(); ++it)
00215         {
00216             cout << *it << "\t";
00217         }
00218         cout << endl;
00219 #endif
00220 
00221         RuleNode* node = ruleRoot_;
00222         bool isValid = true;
00223         for(it=posVec.begin(); it!=posVec.end()-1; ++it)
00224         {
00225             int posIndex = getIndexFromAlphaPOS(*it);
00226             if(posIndex < 0 || posIndex >= tableSize_)
00227             {
00228                 isValid = false;
00229                 break;
00230             }
00231 
00232             if(! node->children_[posIndex])
00233                 node->children_[posIndex] = new RuleNode(node->level_+1, tableSize_);
00234 
00235             node = node->children_[posIndex];
00236         }
00237 
00238         int targetPOS = getIndexFromAlphaPOS(*it);
00239         if(! isValid || targetPOS < 0)
00240         {
00241             cerr << "ignore invalid rule: " << line << endl;
00242             cerr << "some POS string in this rule is unknown." << endl;
00243             continue;
00244         }
00245 
00246         // save target only if not assigned before
00247         if(node->target_ < 0)
00248             node->target_ = targetPOS;
00249     }
00250 
00251 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00252     cout << endl;
00253 #endif
00254 
00255     return true;
00256 }
00257 
00258 const RuleNode* POSTable::getCombineRule(int startPOS, const MeCab::Node* nextNode) const
00259 {
00260     assert(startPOS >=0 && nextNode);
00261 
00262     const RuleNode* ruleNode = 0;
00263     const RuleNode* result = 0;
00264 
00265     // check whether "compound.def" is loaded
00266     if(ruleRoot_)
00267         ruleNode = ruleRoot_->children_[startPOS];
00268 
00269     const MeCab::Node* tokenNode = nextNode;
00270     while(ruleNode)
00271     {
00272         if(ruleNode->target_ >= 0)
00273             result = ruleNode;
00274 
00275         // in case of tokenNode is EOS node
00276         if(! tokenNode->next)
00277             break;
00278 
00279         ruleNode = ruleNode->children_[(int)tokenNode->posid];
00280         tokenNode = tokenNode->next;
00281     }
00282 
00283 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00284     if(result)
00285         cout << result->level_ << " POSes are combined into " << strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][result->target_] << endl;
00286     else
00287         cout << "no rule found" << endl;
00288 #endif
00289 
00290     return result;
00291 }
00292 
00293 int POSTable::getIndexFromAlphaPOS(const std::string& posStr) const
00294 {
00295     map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = alphaPOSMap_.find(posStr);
00296     if(it != alphaPOSMap_.end())
00297         return it->second;
00298 
00299     return -1;
00300 }
